(static) configure(options)

Source:
  • index.mjs, line 424
Sets global ApiClient configuration that is shared between instances
Parameters:
Name Type Description
options Object
Properties
Name Type Description
URL function `URL`-compatible URL parser, see: https://is.gd/Wbyu4k and https://is.gd/FziUWo

delete(url, queryParamsopt, bodyopt, optionsopt) → {Promise.<Response>}

Source:
  • index.mjs, line 243
Sends a DELETE request
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
url string absolute url or relative that will be joined with base url
queryParams Object | null <optional>
 query params that will be added to `url`
body string | Object <optional>
 request body. Used as-is when string or stringified according to given data `type` when Object
options ApiOptions <optional>
 options that will override defaults and options specified in the constructor
Throws:
  • ClientHttpError
  • ServerHttpError
  • ResponseDataTypeMismatchError
  • AbortedHttpError
  • TimeoutHttpError
  • Error
Returns:
Type
